descriptions.main: View and manage product catalogs from provincial cannabis distributors.
descriptions.mainVirtual: Manage and upload provincial cannabis product catalogs
descriptions.scrollHint: Scroll horizontally to view all columns â†’

upload.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a CSV or Excel file.
upload.pleaseSelectFile: Please select a file to upload.

table.noProductsUpload: No products found. Upload a catalog to get started.

instructions.line1: The OCS catalog file should contain all required columns as per the OCS specification.
instructions.line2: Products are matched and updated using the OCS Variant Number as the unique key.
instructions.line3: New products will be inserted, existing products will be updated with the latest information.
instructions.line4: Rating and rating count fields will be preserved during updates.
